QNAP添加man pages
item.description:
<blockquote> <p>默认<code>QNAP</code>是不带<code>man</code>命令的，但是，作为一个<code>Linux</code>重度用户怎么能忍？得想办法安装man啊！经过一番努力，最终成功安装man pages!</p> </blockquote> <p><img src="https://cimg1.17lai.site/data/2022/04/2120220421192048.svg" alt=""></p> <h2 id="需求">需求</h2> <p>默认<code>QNAP</code>是不带<code>man</code>命令的，但是，作为一个<code>Linux</code>重度用户怎么能忍？</p> <blockquote> <p>得想办法安装man啊！</p> </blockquote> <h2 id="验证">验证</h2> <p>先试一下</p> <pre class="line-numbers language-bash" data-language="bash"><code class="language-bash"><span class="token comment"># man</span> -sh: man: <span class="token builtin class-name">command</span> not found<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span><span></span></span></code></pre> <p>基本可以死心了。</p> <p>看看busybox版本</p> <pre class="line-numbers language-bash" data-language="bash"><code class="language-bash"><span class="token comment"># /bin/busybox </span> BusyBox v1.24.1 <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">2022</span>-03-24 03:13:07 CST<span class="token punctuation">)</span> multi-call binary. BusyBox is copyrighted by many authors between <span class="token number">1998</span>-2015. Licensed under GPLv2. See <span class="token builtin class-name">source</span> distribution <span class="token keyword">for</span> detailed copyright notices.
Usage: busybox <span class="token punctuation">[</span>function <span class="token punctuation">[</span>arguments<span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">..</span>.<span class="token punctuation">]</span> or: busybox --list or: <span class="token keyword">function</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span>arguments<span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">..</span>.
BusyBox is a multi-call binary that combines many common Unix utilities into a single executable. Most people will create a <span class="token function">link</span> to busybox <span class="token keyword">for</span> each <span class="token keyword">function</span> they wish to use and BusyBox will act like whatever it was invoked as.
Currently defined functions: <span class="token punctuation">[</span>, <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">[</span>, addgroup, adduser, arping, ash, awk, base64, basename, bunzip2, bzcat, bzip2, cat, chattr, chgrp, chmod, chown, chroot, chvt, cksum, clear, cmp, cp, cpio, crond, crontab, cut, date, dc, dd, deallocvt, delgroup, deluser, depmod, df, diff, dirname, dmesg, dnsdomainname, dos2unix, du, echo, egrep, env, expr, false, fdisk, fgrep, find, free, fsync, getty, grep, groups, gunzip, gzip, halt, hd, head, hexdump, hostname, hwclock, id, ifconfig, init, insmod, install, ip, ipaddr, iplink, iproute, iprule, iptunnel, kill, killall, killall5, klogd, less, linuxrc, ln, logger, login, logread, ls, lsattr, lsmod, lspci, md5sum, mkdir, mknod, mktemp, modprobe, more, mount, mv, nameif, netstat, nslookup, openvt, passwd, pidof, ping, ping6, pivot_root, poweroff, printf, ps, pwd, rdate, readlink, realpath, reboot, renice, reset, resize, rm, rmdir, rmmod, route, sed, seq, sh, sha1sum, sleep, sort, split, start-stop-daemon, stat, strings, swapoff, swapon, switch_root, sync, sysctl, syslogd, tail, tar, taskset, tee, telnet, test, tftp, time, top, touch, tr, traceroute, traceroute6, true, tty, umount, uname, uniq, unix2dos, unzip, uptime, usleep, vi, watch, wc, wget, which, whoami, xargs, yes, zcat<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span></span></code></pre> <p>可以看到内置<code>busybox</code>不支持<code>man</code>的。</p> <h2 id="寻找解决方案">寻找解决方案</h2> <p>去看看官方<code>Busybox</code>是否支持</p> <blockquote> <p><strong>Busybox</strong> : https://busybox.net/downloads/BusyBox.html</p> </blockquote> <p>发现是支持<code>man</code>的，只是<code>QNAP</code>没有编译进去。</p> <h2 id="解决思路">解决思路</h2> <ul> <li>给<code>QNAP</code>提需求单？ 是一个选择，但是太慢了，想官方内置，不知道等到猴年马月了。</li> <li><code>QNAP</code>似乎开发了底层SDK，记得有下载过，还没有仔细研究怎么使用。不过记得有附带编译工具链，自己动手编译一个<code>busybox</code>版本替代系统内置的，应该也是可行的。</li> </ul> <h2 id="去看看别人有啥解决方案？">去看看别人有啥解决方案？</h2> <blockquote> <p>Optware has man but only for the optware installed packages (if supplied) and or manually added files in the man folder.</p> <p>https://forum.qnap.com/viewtopic.php?t=49961</p> </blockquote> <p>柳暗花明又一村， <code>entware</code> 支持<code>man pages</code>，可以直接安装了。</p> <blockquote> <p>插入<code>entware</code>安装方法：</p> <p>打开<code>App Center</code>，源选择刚添加的<code>Qnapclub</code>，点击搜索框输入<code>entware</code>，选<code>Entware-std 1.03</code></p> </blockquote> <p>一条命令解决：</p> <pre class="line-numbers language-bash" data-language="bash"><code class="language-bash">opkg <span class="token function">install</span> man-db man-pages<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span></span></code></pre> <p>安装完之后验证：</p> <pre class="line-numbers language-bash" data-language="bash"><code class="language-bash"><span class="token comment"># man fopen</span> FOPEN<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> Linux Programmer's Manual FOPEN<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
NAME fopen, fdopen, freopen - stream <span class="token function">open</span> functions
SYNOPSIS <span class="token comment">#include &lt;stdio.h&gt;</span>
FILE *fopen<span class="token punctuation">(</span>const char *restrict pathname, const char *restrict mode<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> FILE *fdopen<span class="token punctuation">(</span>int fd, const char *mode<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> FILE *freopen<span class="token punctuation">(</span>const char *restrict pathname, const char *restrict mode, FILE *restrict stream<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
Feature Test Macro Requirements <span class="token keyword">for</span> glibc <span class="token punctuation">(</span>see feature_test_macros<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">7</span><span class="token punctuation">))</span>:
fdopen<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>: _POSIX_C_SOURCE
DESCRIPTION The fopen<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token keyword">function</span> opens the <span class="token function">file</span> whose name is the string pointed to by pathname and associates a stream with it.
The argument mode points to a string beginning with one of the following sequences <span class="token punctuation">(</span>possibly followed by additional char‐ acters, as described below<span class="token punctuation">)</span>:
r Open text <span class="token function">file</span> <span class="token keyword">for</span> reading. The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.
r+ Open <span class="token keyword">for</span> reading and writing. The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.
w Truncate <span class="token function">file</span> to zero length or create text <span class="token function">file</span> <span class="token keyword">for</span> writing. The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.
w+ Open <span class="token keyword">for</span> reading and writing. The <span class="token function">file</span> is created <span class="token keyword">if</span> it does not exist, otherwise it is truncated. The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.<span aria-hidden="true" <p>问题就这么解决了。</p> <blockquote> <p>一个问题，我有很多其它手册，想要安装，怎么办？</p> </blockquote> <h2 id="安装其它man手册">安装其它<code>man</code>手册</h2> <p>已经有了<code>man</code>命令，只要把手册安装到<code>entware man</code>命令目录中就行了。</p> <p>找到<code>enteware man</code>手册目录。</p> <pre class="line-numbers language-bash" data-language="bash"><code class="language-bash"><span class="token builtin class-name">cd</span> /share/CACHEDEV3_DATA/.qpkg/Entware <span class="token function">find</span> <span class="token builtin class-name">.</span> -name <span class="token string">"*man*"</span><span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span><span></span></span></code></pre> <blockquote> <p>TIPS：<code>CACHEDEV3_DATA/.qpkg</code>这个是安装qpkg软件的磁盘。<code>CACHEDEV3</code>似乎是表示第三块插入机器的磁盘。</p> </blockquote> class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span></span></code></pre> <h2 id="安装更多的man-pages">安装更多的<code>man pages</code></h2> <blockquote> <ul> <li><code>Git</code>手册下载地址： https://mirrors.edge.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/</li> <li>中文<code>man</code>手册： https://github.com/man-pages-zh/manpages-zh</li> </ul> </blockquote> <blockquote> <p>PS: 中文<code>man</code>手册有不少依赖需要解决，在<code>Docker</code>中已经可以查询中文<code>man</code>了，<code>qnap</code>中试了下，解决依赖搞得头大，暂时就<code>docker</code>中用中文<code>man</code>好了</p> </blockquote> <p>真正收工了！</p> <h2 id="附录">附录</h2> <h3 id="man介绍">man介绍</h3> <p>man命令并非仅仅能查看命令或者函数的介绍，在linux中，有丰富的帮助手册信息，并且每一个手册都有一个编号。编号和对应内容如下：</p> <table> <thead> <tr> <th style="text-align:left">编号</th> <th style="text-align:left">代表内容</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">1</td> <td style="text-align:left">可执行程序或shell命令，如ls</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">2</td> <td style="text-align:left">系统调用，如chdir</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">3</td> <td style="text-align:left">库函数，如printf</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">4</td> <td style="text-align:left">设备或特殊文件，如tty</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">5</td> <td style="text-align:left">配置文件格式或约定</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">6</td> <td style="text-align:left">游戏</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">7</td> <td style="text-align:left">杂项</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">8</td> <td style="text-align:left">管理命令，通常只有root用户可以使用</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">9</td> <td style="text-align:left">内核例程</td> </tr> <tr> <td style="text-align:left">n</td> <td style="text-align:left">内置命令，如cd</td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <h3 id="常用快捷键">常用快捷键</h3> <blockquote> <p><strong>手册内容</strong></p> <p>多数手册包含以下几部分内容：</p> <ul> <li>NAME 功能的简单描述</li> <li>SYNOPSIS 语法格式</li> <li>DESCRIPTION 描述</li> <li>OPTIONS 选项</li> <li>ERRORS 描述出错场景，<strong>这在排查错误时很有帮助</strong></li> <li>NOTES 注意事项</li> <li>FILES 相关文件，例如对于man命令的FILES部分内容显示了它的配置文件位置等信息</li> <li>EXAMPLES 使用示例，会提供一些简单的示例</li> <li>BUGS 存在的bug，<strong>当遇到奇怪的问题时，不妨看看当前命令是否有已知的bug</strong></li> </ul> <p><strong>基本查看</strong></p> <p>手册的查看和less查看文本类似，可以参考《文本查看篇》或查看less命令的使用，这里介绍基本操作：</p> <ul> <li>空格 向下翻页</li> <li>Home 回到第一页</li> <li>End 跳到最后一页</li> <li>/string 向前搜索string字符串</li> <li>?string 向后搜索string字符串</li> <li>n 下一个匹配字符</li> <li>N 上一个匹配字符</li> <li>q 退出</li> </ul> </blockquote> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/bilicard.css" type="text/css">
